author.name: The Sceptical Chymist - Blog Posts
author.description: The Sceptical Chymist is a blog by the editors of Nature and the Research journals - and a forum for our readers, authors and the entire chemical community. We'll discuss what's new and exciting in chemistry and chemical biology, be it in our journals or elsewhere. We hope for spirited conversation! To contact the editors directly with confidential questions or feedback, please email 'thescepticalchymist at boston.nature.com'.
